Text: The Trump regime declared Antifa a terrorist organisation and then declared all protestors Antifa; this is a move to legitimise killing civilians. Trump has defined the terms of engagement of the Civil War he is inciting, it is not Black vs White it is Fascist vs Antifascist.

He's using the American military against the American people.He tear-gassed peaceful protesters and fired rubber bullets.For a photo.For our children, for the very soul of our country, we must defeat him. But I mean it when I say this: we can only do it together.

Trump just had peaceful demonstrators viciously attacked.  No, Mr. President. This is not a dictatorship. This is the United States of America. Our citizens have a constitutional right to peacefully protest. It's called the First Amendment.
